code: import{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pokemon=props=>{const[nivel,setNivel]=useState(1);const onSubirNivel=event=>{setNivel(x=>x+1);};const onBajarNivel=event=>{setNivel(x=>x-1);};const calcularHp=()=>{return 108+nivel*3;};const calcularAtaque=()=>{return 130+nivel*3;};const calcularDefensa=()=>{return 95+nivel*3;};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Me la Garchomp"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Nivel:",nivel," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onSubirNivel,children:"Subir nivel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onBajarNivel,children:"Bajar nivel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["HP: ",calcularHp()," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Ataque: ",calcularAtaque()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Defensa: ",calcularDefensa()]})]});};export default Pokemon;
